price: ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߝߙߊߥߎ߲߫ ߓߟߏ߫ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲߫ ߸ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߖߘߍ߬ߕߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߕߌߢߍߟߌߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
